basics.name: Xin (David) Zhao
basics.label: Bioinformatic Data Analyst
basics.summary: I am a bioinformatic data analyst with a strong background in molecular biology and bioinformatics. I have a passion for data analysis and visualization, and I am always looking for new challenges to improve my skills. I am a quick learner and a team player, and I am always willing to help others.

work.name: The Metabolomics Innovation Centre, Wishart Research Group
work.summary: I am responsible for developing and maintaining bioinformatics pipelines for metabolomics data analysis. I also provide training and support to users, and I am involved in various research projects.

work.name: Department of Pediatrics, University of Alberta
work.summary: I am responsible for conducting epidemiological studies on the gut microbiome of infants and children. I am also involved in the development of bioinformatics pipelines for microbiome data analysis and academic publications.
highlights: Machine Learning-based Prediction Model for Children Obesity

courses: Genomic and Phenotypic Comparison of Lactobacillus reuteri from Gut and Food Habitats
